goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 865kB)
graph_title: Coverage of essential health services (defined as the average coverage of essential services based on tracer interventions that include reproductive, maternal, newborn and child health, infectious diseases, non-communicable diseases and service capacity and access, among the general and the most disadvantaged population)
indicator_name: Coverage of essential health services (defined as the average coverage of essential services based on tracer interventions that include reproductive, maternal, newborn and child health, infectious diseases, non-communicable diseases and service capacity and access, among the general and the most disadvantaged population)
target_name: AConseguire una copertura sanitaria universale, compresa la protezione dai rischi finanziari, l'accesso a servizi essenziali di assistenza sanitaria di qualità e l'accesso a farmaci essenziali sicuri, efficaci, di qualità e a prezzi accessibili e vaccini per tutti
indicator_name_national: Coverage of essential health services (defined as the average coverage of essential services based on tracer interventions that include reproductive, maternal, newborn and child health, infectious diseases, non-communicable diseases and service capacity and access, among the general and the most disadvantaged population)
